name: HistoryResponse
desc: A response that contains the customer’s transaction history for an app.

items.name: appAppleId
items.desc: The app’s identifier in the App Store.

items.name: bundleId
items.desc: The bundle identifier of the app.

items.name: environment
items.desc: The server environment in which you’re making the request, whether sandbox or production.

items.name: hasMore
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the App Store has more transactions than are returned in this request.

items.name: revision
items.desc: A token you use in a query to request the next set of transactions from the Get Transaction History endpoint.

items.name: signedTransactions
items.desc: An array of in-app purchase transactions for the customer, signed by Apple, in JSON Web Signature format.
